review: 9/12/2015 update. For some reason, I decided to try again. I guess I just hate giving up. And most of the things i had looked for were there. It is easy enough to use, but still requires another device when only one is needed. For the most part, will continue to use my tv remote.I have several kindle e readers, kindle fires, echo, love them all.I have samsung smart tv with apps and remote. I have a sony blu-ray player with apps and remote. I get to speak to this device, so big deal.it takes me to the shows, but not where i left off and not with my pre-programmed options (closed captioning and descriptive audio, when available). I didn't get my tv set up in time so it's too late to return it.
